products.name: Baguette
products.description: This is one of the most striking symbols of France ... a country that is considered a cradle of food and eldorado for all food lovers.

products.name: Palyanitsa
products.description: In the production of Palyanitsa bread, we use only high-quality raw materials. The production technology is based on the use of leaven, which gives the product a pleasant taste and aroma, and also enriches with minerals (phosphorus, magnesium, potassium), vitamins (group B and vitamin PP, which are not destroyed by high temperatures).

products.name: Coconut tart
products.description: Glazed with a coat of apricot jelly and finished with a cherry, these circular tarts are stuffed with a moist, rich coconut filling that is a mix of chewy and crisp.

products.name: Borodynskiy bread
products.description: Borodino bread is a variety of “black” bread that is widespread in Russia and is also very popular in the countries of the former Soviet Union. It is baked from a mixture of rye flour and second-grade wheat flour in a custard way.

products.name: Limonchello donut
products.description: Our homage to the All-American staple includes chunks of hotdog and diced green onions baked within a soft bun.Filled with a sweet and tangy Lemoncello buttercream, this donut definitely has a sweet surprise inside.

products.name: Wholegrain bread
products.description: Since whole grain flour contains a grain shell, almost all products made from it are much healthier than those that contain flour of the first or second grade. It is the shell that contains all the vitamins, useful enzymes and amino acids, and the inside of the grain consists of almost all carbohydrates. This type of bread helps to remove toxins, salts of heavy metals and radioactive particles from the body, and is also rich in fiber, which cleanses the intestines and helps prevent cancer. Whole grain bread helps fight diabetes, coronary heart disease, and obesity.

products.name: Hazelnut nutella donut
products.description: Topped with a thin layer of Nutella and covered with crispy cereal pieces, this donut introduces a new way to eat your favorite chocolate spread.

products.name: La Kaminski bread
products.description: Custard bread with cranberries contains 25% dietary fiber, which are invaluable to the body and help maintain the flexibility and harmony of our body.

products.name: Buckwheat bread
products.description: The manufacturing technology involves the use of wheat yeast and yeast together, which gives the finished product vitamins (groups B and PP) and trace elements (phosphorus, potassium, magnesium).

products.name: Pumpkin bread
products.description: The manufacturing technology involves the use of wheat yeast and yeast together, which gives the finished product vitamins (groups B and PP) and trace elements (phosphorus, potassium, magnesium).

products.name: Danish nutella chocolate
products.description: Folded inside layers of puff pastry, creamy Nutella chocolate is hidden inside this danish.

products.name: Spring onion bun
products.description: Our homage to the All-American staple includes chunks of hotdog and diced green onions baked within a soft bun.

products.name: Muffin
products.description: Muffins own the sky! After all, they are pieces of happiness in the palm of your hand.

products.name: Eclairs
products.description: You haven't enjoyed an Éclair until you've tried a our fresh eclair!

products.name: Matcha donut
products.description: This Japanese inspired donut has a matcha green tea based glaze on top of a classic donut ring.

products.name: Croissant
products.description: Confectionery masterpiece containing almond cream of its own production.

products.name: Chocolate glazed donut
products.description: Our fried donut is light and airy and is glazed with creamy chocolate.
